forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
